Navigationbar:

Fan: <span style='color:orange;font-weight:bold;'>[fanspeed]</span><span style='padding-left:30px;'></span>
Progress: <span style='color:orange;font-weight:bold;'>[progress]%</span><span style='padding-left:30px;'></span>
Layer: <span style='color:orange;font-weight:bold;width:30px;'>[current_layer]/[total_layers]</span><span style='padding-left:30px;'></span>
Height: <span style='color:orange;font-weight:bold;width:30px;'>[current_height]/[total_height] mm</span><span style='padding-left:30px;'></span>

Printer Display:

[progress]% L=[current_layer]/[total_layers]
